remarks: If the generators commute, the generated monoid is commutative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cntzspan.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
cntzspan.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
cntzspan.h $e |- H = ( G |`s ( K ` S ) ) $.
cntzspan $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ S C_ ( Z ` S ) ) -> H e. CMnd ) $.
